pullRequest.title: Add custom access log fields to JSON logs and logstashCollector
pullRequest.bodyText:
Re-introducing PR #11189 with fixes to the FAT tests.
Fixes #12591
#build

commit.message:
Working basic impl

Condense populateFormatters into two instead of four

Move static var out of AccessLogData, fix configuration checkers

Add ability to rename/omit specific cookie/header fields

Add omit cookies/headers functionality and fix field name inconsistency

Fix wrong server name and user dir fields being printed in JSON logs

Address comments

Address comments

Address comment

temporarily disable access log tests to build

Fix duplicate fields being printed
Add FAT tests for new jsonAccessLogFields property

Decouple logstashCollector feature from http, fix duplicate headers/cookie bug, address test bugs

Fix timing issue in test, add multiple endpoints test

Close BufferedReader and add connection logs

Add lower timeout threshold for waits in assertNull

Address thread safety issue with cached start fields, use better method to remove duplicate tokens

Remove removeDuplicates() method, replace with better method that splits tokens into a HashMap while removing duplicates

always call updateFieldMappings after server config update

Fix the startMessageJsonFields method to match the other similar methods

Fix up formatting, simplify the startXXXJsonFields methods, add setters

Remove tempStartFields var

Final code clean up + fix copyright dates
Remove case sensitivity for headers, add warning for not providing header name, add null check to prevent NPE to continue after logging warning msg
Change bytesSent field to long instead of String, fix warning messages

Edit TRAS3012W warning message, move applyJsonFields method call

Move applyJsonFields method call to after creating handlers

Fix message
Add null checks for waitForStringInLog, wait for CWWKO0219I before hitting /metrics endpoint

nodes.bodyText:
Rather than "field(s)," use "fields" or add "one or more" to the sentence. Suggested rewrites:

Header name was not specified for accessLogging logFormat fields: {0}.


Header name is missing for one or more accessLogging logFormat fields: {0}.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -156,6 +156,10 @@ JSON_FIELDS_INVALID_CHARACHTER=TRAS3011W: An invalid character was provided in t
 JSON_FIELDS_INVALID_CHARACHTER.explanation= Only letters, numbers, and : are accepted in the JSON logging field name mapping property
 JSON_FIELDS_INVALID_CHARACHTER.useraction= Change your JSON logging field name mapping property value to remove invalid characters
 
+JSON_ACCESS_LOG_NO_HEADER_NAME_SPECIFIED=TRAS3012W: Header name was not specified for accessLogging logFormat field(s): {0}.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested changes to shorten the description:

Specifies the maximum number of events to send per second. To throttle the events, specify a value greater than zero.


Specifies the maximum number of events to send per second. A value greater than zero throttles the events.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -25,4 +25,9 @@ maxFieldLength=Maximum field length
 maxFieldLength.desc=Specifies maximum number of characters for the message field associated with the events for various sources. If you specify a value of 0 or -1, the maximum number of characters is unlimited.
 
 maxEvents=Maximum events per second
-maxEvents.desc=Specifies the maximum number of events to be sent per second. If you specify a value greater than zero, then it will be used for throttling the events.
\ No newline at end of file
+maxEvents.desc=Specifies the maximum number of events to be sent per second. If you specify a value greater than zero, then it will be used for throttling the events.
